text:
@atrupar "Hydroxychloroquine" is what POUTS wants the media focused on.
Not Flynn, or Barr's corruption, or #COVID19 death tolls, or illegal Saudi arms deals, or #Stormygate, or his financials, or the unredacted Mueller Report, or the kids still in cages, or human rights violations, or... https://t.co/RLyTgNt3rh
